toast.api-error.title: An error has occurred
api-error.invalid_request: Internal error: Invalid request. Please contact the administrator for more information.
api-error.not_found: Internal error: The resource is not found. Please contact the administrator for more information.
api-error.forbidden: You don't have the permission to access this resource.
api-error.internal_server_error: Internal error: A fatal problem has occurred. Please contact the administrator for more information.
api-error.invalid_response_from_provider: Internal error: Unknown result returned from the authentication provider
navbar.login.modal.title: Login
navbar.login.modal.body: Log in with your Mastodon account. Enter the domain of the server (e.g. knzk.me).
navbar.login.modal.help: What data do we get from your Mastodon account?
navbar.login.modal.continue: Please continue to login in a new window...
